definition: to take/to get/to choose/to fetch
ear/handle (archaeology)/and that is all (Classical Chinese)
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
to acquire/to get/to obtain
to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
to cancel/cancellation
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
to receive/to collect
to gain/to get/to acquire
to hear (news)/to listen to
to replace/to supersede/to supplant/(chemistry) substitution
to receive/to draw/to get
to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents
to withdraw (money)/to collect (left luggage)/to extract/to refine
to seize/to capture/to wrest control of
to suppress/to crack down on/to prohibit
to take out/to extract/to draw out

sentences.english: In what direction should the pilot head in order to travel due north ?
sentences.chinese: 为使这架飞机向正北航行，驾驶员应取什么航向？

sentences.english: The spark plugs on modern bikes are always hard to reach.
sentences.chinese: 火星塞很不好取下，因为放置的太深。

sentences.english: But would you like express service or same-day?
sentences.chinese: 不外，您是要快洗效力照旧当日取？

sentences.english: The compressive strength is of returning fluid sample blocks is about 60% of coring blocks.
sentences.chinese: 返浆试块的抗压强度约为取芯试块的60%。

sentences.english: And what are some of the names you've given your little front-seat driver?
sentences.chinese: 你给这个小东西取了什么名字？

sentences.english: He took the spring out of the clock but now he can't get it back.
sentences.chinese: 他将钟表里的发条取了出来，可现在装上不了。

sentences.english: When necessary in these parts take discharge for mould anti-bma or training.
sentences.chinese: 必要时要在这些部位取分泌物作霉菌镜检或培养。

sentences.english: For water intake pump house pressure water test shall be made on the bedrock so as to define its permeability.
sentences.chinese: 取水泵房处在基岩中进行压水试验，以确定其透水性。

sentences.english: After logarithm fetch on minimum of viscosity, which get linear relation with pre-annealed temperature.
sentences.chinese: 粘度极小值取对数之后与预退火温度成线性关系。

sentences.english: Would you like express service or same-day?
sentences.chinese: 您是要快洗服务还是当日取？

sentences.english: McCoy is charged with unlawfully taking the car, and is now awaiting trial.
sentences.chinese: 麦考伊被控以非法取走车辆的罪名，目前正等候审判。

sentences.english: The young man made a run for it. Soon the manager broke free of us too and charged.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人跑过来取了帽子，很快经理也从人群中挤出来。

sentences.english: By taking a finite-time iteration of the compensation sequence, a suboptimal control law is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 取补偿项序列的有限次迭代值，获得次优控制律。

sentences.english: Please take yours to get your note-books.
sentences.chinese: 请按顺序取走你们的笔记本。

sentences.english: Fill a large high-sided skillet with 1 inch water.
sentences.chinese: 取一个较深的煮锅，倒入1英寸深的水。

definition: to take out/to extract/to draw out
old variant of 留[liu2]
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
old variant of 留[liu2]
to get rid of/to exclude/to eliminate/to remove/to delete/to strip out/to extract
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)
old variant of 拿[na2]
variant of 拿[na2]
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to put into
reserve/spare/alternate/backup
to load
to eliminate/to remove/except for/apart from
to pound into pieces/to mash
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to mash/to beat to a pulp
